comments: Her assignments are easy, show up, DONT MISS, do all 4 assignments she grades fairly and doesn\'t base your grade just off your tests like most do. she understands not everyone is a test taker, like me. She also lets u take a look at the test before u take it and allows u to look for the answers before taking it. the only way to fail is if u try to

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  AMAZING LECTURES  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
comments: I have taken Dr. Moe for a few classes now, she is an amazing professor. Her lesson plans are easy to follow, you must read and keep up with the power points to pass the class. Typed worked is required and no late work is accepted. Test are fairly easy and study sheet is provided. I will take her again!

comments: Sondra Moe is a nice person, but omg her classes are super boring!!. she will never let her classes out early. she is a tough& picking grader. she speaks very soft & low so take a front seat or you will have trouble hearing her. she references the book a lot, so make sure to take it to class. lastly she likes to show very super outdated videos.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I absolutely loved her class. Assignments were extremely easy. I get nervous when I have to take a test and got D\'s on all 4 tests, but with perfect attendance, class participation, and turning in all 4 assignments on time I still managed to pass her class with an A. Overall easy class

comments: Took two classes with her. One class was online and the other on campus. On campus you need to be in class. She takes off points if you come late or leave early. Overall, the class is easy is you just attend class. Always has a way of knowing whether you attended class or not. Try to do all the extra credit. Every small point counts in her class.
